about_the_game:
About the game

An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a young woman embarking on a train filled with ageless vampires, in hopes of seducing one of them and get bitten to become immortal.

Visual Novel Description

All aboard!!!
The Vampire Express Train has finally reached Mystic River, and young Miss Shirley made sure to be on it when it left the station. Filled with ageless, gorgeous vampires, the train was Shirley’s last opportunity to seduce one of them and convince it to sink its fangs in her slender neck and grant her the one thing she values more above everything else: ageless beauty!
She got her train ticket in the form of a vile and vicious bloodsucker called Lady DeVille, who was notorious for choosing young and beautiful humans to entertain her during her travels. But her plans were shattered when Lady DeVille chose the company of The Viscount instead of a low-class human like her, and sent poor Shirley to sleep with his “Maid” in the Viscount’s private quarters.
Lucky to her…the maid turned out to be an even bigger prize than the vicious Lady.
Named Yvette, the century old Vampire is not only nicer, but also a big fan of having gorgeous females keeping her bed warm in the cold nights, thus being Shirley’s last shot at becoming an immortal.

Will Shirley be able to seduce Yvette and get what she wants?
Embark in our Vampire Express Train and find out how it all played out.

Features

- 50+ HD renders
- Animations

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex in still images among male/female characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
